name: autoimport.filesToScan
desc: Glob for files to watch and scan, e.g ./src/** ./src/app/**/*.ts. Defaults to **/*.{ts,tsx}

name: autoimport.absolute
desc: True if the imports should be absolute to the workspace root

name: autoimport.sourceRoot
desc: Change this if your absolute urls are not absolute from workspace root e.g ./src

name: autoimport.showNotifications
desc: Specifies whether to show notifications from Auto Import

name: autoimport.doubleQuotes
desc: Specifies whether to use double quotes

name: autoimport.semicolon
desc: Specifies whether to use a semicolon at the end of the line

name: autoimport.spaceBetweenBraces
desc: Specifies whether to use spaces between first and last brace

name: autoimport.autoComplete
desc: Adds found items to intellisense and automatically imports then

name: autoimport.higherOrderComponents
desc: This allows the importer to find your components name bypass the higher order components that you wrap it in. Each higher order component must be deliminated by pipe |. example: connect|withRouter
